pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bound Constrained Optimal Sample Allocation // Implements bound constrained optimization of sample sizes in power analysis of multilevel regression discontinuity designs (MRDDs) and multilevel randomized trials (MRTs) with continuous outcomes. Bulus, M. Dong, N. (2019). Bound Constrained Optimization of Sample Sizes Subject to Monetary Restrictions in Planning MRTs and MRDDs (Revise Resubmit).
